title: Broadcasting Live From Build America Mutual
itunes:title: Broadcasting Live From Build America Mutual
description:
Sean McCarthy, CEO and Bob Cochran, Chairman at Build America Mutual, discuss infrastructure financing and tax overhaul. Clarence Anthony, Executive Director of National League of Cities, talks about the muni bond outlook. Ben Watkins, Director of Bond Finance for the State of Florida, talks about the impact of tax reform on infrastructure financing in the sunshine state. Christopher Hamel, Head of Municipal Finance at RBC, explains why governments need to use existing infrastructure funds more efficiently. Kent Hiteshew, Strategic Advisor at EY, talks about how Hurricane Maria is impacting Puerto Rico’s debt outlook. And Carol and Cory hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
